data.title: Teide National Park
data.text: Teide National Park is a national park located in Tenerife Canary Islands Spain The national park is centered on Mount Teide the highest mountain of Spain 3 718 meters high in addition the highest volcano in the Atlantic Ocean islands and the third highest volcano in the world from its base in the ocean floor 7 500 meters high Pico Viejo also included within the national park limits is the second highest volcano in the Canary Islands with its 3 135 m peak Mount Teide and Pico Viejo are the only two peaks in the Canary islands rising above the 3 000 m level
